model-value.description: The model value of the component plus

component-name.description: The name of the component used

component-model-value.description: The model value of the component used

component-model-event.description: The model event of the component used

component-attr-or-prop.description: The props of the component used

fullwidth.description: Styles the component plus as a full width component item

limit.description: Maximum number of components that can be added
